snippet: The e-commerce behemoth Alibaba filed in the United States to sell stock to the public for the first time, in an embrace of the global capital markets that represents a coming-of-age for the booming Chinese Internet industry.
abstract: The e-commerce behemoth Alibaba filed in the United States to sell stock to the public for the first time, in an embrace of the global capital markets that represents a coming-of-age for the booming Chinese Internet industry.

headline.main: Daily Report: Alibaba Files for Public Stock Offering in the U.S.
